(a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee's Gross Receipts (as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee's sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. ("IA2 Audio and Video Royalty"). For the avoidance of doubt, Licensee may not recoup any portion of the Ice Age 2 Guarantee (as defined in Amendment 1) through its sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products.

(a) From the first unit sold, Fox shall earn a royalty at the rate of ***** percent (*****%) of Licensee's Gross Receipts (as defined in the Agreement) from Licensee's sale and distribution of the IA2 Audio and Video Wireless Products. perturbation.original_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect, unless superseded by future undocumented agreements between representatives of Fox and Licensee.
perturbation.explanation: Adds a clause stating that the agreement can be superseded by future 'undocumented agreements'. This creates a legal contradiction, as the written agreement is ostensibly the binding contract, but the clause suggests it can be overridden by informal, unwritten arrangements. This introduces ambiguity and severely undermines the enforceability of the entire contract.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Statute of Frauds/Contract Law - Requirement for Written Agreements
